label: cascading_failure_01_ep_024
content:
## 2024-02-07 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 160200 | p50: 230ms p95: 620ms p99: 1180ms | err: 3.87% (6200 errors) | success: 96.13%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 159600 | p50: 205ms p95: 540ms p99: 920ms | err: 1.1% (1750 errors) | success: 98.9%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 155100 | p50: 380ms p95: 740ms p99: 870ms | err: 0.49% (760 errors) | success: 99.51%
- /auth: REQUESTS 207900 | p50: 52ms p95: 135ms p99: 255ms | err: 0.2% (420 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 279900 | p50: 68ms p95: 205ms p99: 380ms | err: 0.19% (520 errors) | success: 99.81%
- /search: REQUESTS 244600 | p50: 92ms p95: 255ms p99: 460ms | err: 0.29% (710 errors) | success: 99.71%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 197800 | p50: 120ms p95: 340ms p99: 590ms | err: 0.35% (700 errors) | success: 99.65%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 80% | Mem 84% | Disk 63% | Conns: 7600 | Net: 770/935 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 77% | Mem 82% | Disk 62% | Conns: 7420 | Net: 750/910 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 88% | Mem 86% | Disk 62% | Conns: 8600 | Net: 890/1040 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 54% | Mem 84% | Disk 88% | Conns: 480 | Net: 205/245 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 260 | idle 0 | waiting 480 | exhaustion: 45 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 360ms
- replica: active 100 | idle 0 | waiting 110 | exhaustion: 16 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 95ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 310 | exhaustion: 55 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 460ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.5% | Bandwidth: 10.1 Gbps | Origin requests: 535800

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=820 retry_rate_pct=0.64
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-02: pool=primary events=45 waiting=480
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-01: geo_lookup_p99_ms=870

### Deployments & Changes
- Config change: service-B retry max_attempts set to 2
- Config change: service-B retry jitter enabled

### Events
- Set service-B retry max_attempts from 4 to 2
- Enabled retry jitter in service-B HTTP client
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Reduced feature flag 'recommendations-ml' from 10% to 0%

### On-Call
- Shift: M. Rossi. 20 pages. 7 tickets (SRV-B-289 retry cap, POOL-635, CO-870, GW-401, FF-104, VEND-117, OBS-240). Status: Mitigating.
